DOC.brief_summary: Safety extension study Phase 3 Osteoarthritis trial Tanezumab
DOC.brief_title: Extension Study Of Tanezumab In Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: This study terminate 27 October 2010 follow US FDA clinical hold tanezumab osteoarthritis clinical study halt dose enrollment patient 23 June 2010 potential safety issue .
DOC.criteria: Must participate previous ( specific ) Phase 3 trial Tanezumab osteoarthritis Willing comply schedule visit treatment plan Is medically fit participate trial judgement Investigator
